notes: Latency targets reference end-to-end handler execution durations.
Error rate is weighted across handlers by invocation count.
Throughput approximated as total events per run until time windowing implemented.

future.windowing: Introduce time buckets (1m/5m) for accurate throughput & availability

future.breachSeverityMapping: Map breach magnitude to anomaly severity levels
